text: Jacó Roberto Hilgert (27 January 1926 - 17 December 2020) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Harmonia, Rio Grande do Sul. In 1952, he became a priest. He was the Bishop of Cruz Alta from 1976 to 2002. Hilgert died on 17 December 2020 in Cruz Alta, Rio Grande do Sul from cardiopulmonary arrest, aged 94.Bishop Jacó Roberto Hilgert ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Jacó Roberto Hilgert
